homepage.title: L'Interactive Platform for Understanding Geological Storage of CO2 t'aide à comprendre l'enfouissement du CO2

injection.title: CO2 Injection
injection.description: Learn how carbon dioxide is safely injected into underground geological formations for long-term storage.

formations.title: Rock Formations
formations.description: Discover the specific types of rock layers that make ideal storage sites for captured CO2.

monitoring.title: Monitoring Systems
monitoring.description: Explore the advanced technologies used to monitor and verify CO2 storage integrity over time.

safety.title: Environmental Safety
safety.description: Understand the multiple safety measures and protocols that protect the environment and communities.
